meanings.sent1: The teacher's ironiest smile confused the students.
meanings.sent2: It was the ironiest situation she had ever experienced.
meanings.sent3: His ironiest remark made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The ironiest twist in the story left us all shocked.
meanings.sent5: The ironiest part of the play was when the villain turned out to be the hero.

meanings.sent1: She couldn't help but chuckle at the ironiest of all situations.
meanings.sent2: The ironiest of all was yet to come in the story.
meanings.sent3: The ironiest of outcomes left everyone speechless.
meanings.sent4: In a twist of fate, he found himself in the ironiest of positions.
